text:
uduq tyaM jAqtavE#dasaM dEqvaM ~Mva#hanti kEqtava#H | dRuqSE viSvA#yaq sUrya$M || 
ciqtraM dEqvAnAq-muda#gAqdanI#kaqM cakShu# rmiqtrasyaq varu#NasyAq&gnEH | 
A&prAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI aqntari#kShaq(gm)q sUrya# AqtmA jaga#tastaqsthuSha#Sca || 
agnEq naya# suqpathA# rAqyE aqsmAn. viSvA#ni dEva vaqyunA#ni viqdvAn | 
yuqyOqddhya#sma-jju#hurAqNa mEnOq BUyi#ShThAM tEq nama# uktiM vidhEma || 
diva#M gacCaq suva#H pata rUqpENa# - [  ] 44
